name: Jump Jumpz
description: Reach as high as possible while collecting as many coins as you can. This game has the difficulty and style of Arcade games of the 80s.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core E8600 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
